custom_evaluators.name: json_structure_validator
custom_evaluators.description: Validates the core structure of the JSON response from the story agent.

custom_evaluators.name: story_quality_metrics
custom_evaluators.description: Evaluates the quality of the generated story content.

evaluation_notes: Evaluation for the story_agent. This agent uses a direct LLM response and does not involve tool use, so tool_trajectory_avg_score is expected to be 1.0. The primary evaluation focuses on the JSON output structure and the creative quality of the generated story. The response_match_score is set to 0.7 to allow for some creative variance in the story text, as long as the core elements and keywords are present.
